text: Everyone's tastes are different and I didn't expect to like this after reading some of the reviews.  I was pleasantly surprised and glad I tried it. I prefer this French Vanilla over a couple of the other brands.  It's the only one I don't have to add sugar or creamer to and it's not too heavy on the vanilla for my taste.  I'm ordering enough to keep stocked up since it's my evening treat and a great price!
